what: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
text: Generate SDTM datasets aligned Johnson & Johnson’s Clinical Statistical Programming standards.

title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
text: Generates SDTM datasets comply J&J standards Built top ‘pharmaversesdtm’ package Implements data conversion pharmaverse format J&J standards format Provides reproducible consistent test data

title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
text: Currently supports following SDTM domains: - MH (Medical History) - DS (Disposition)

title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
text: can install development version GitHub:
code: install.packages("pharmaversesdtmjnj") #CRAN Release #install.packages("devtools") #or for the rolling release #devtools::install_github("johnsonandjohnson/pharmaversesdtmjnj")

title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
code: library(pharmaversesdtmjnj)  # Access the SDTM datasets directly # These datasets are loaded lazily when the package is loaded head(ds) head(mh)

title: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data
text: Test datasets sourced pharmaversesdtm package, utilized data CDISC pilot project.

title: ds — ds
text: ds modified pharmaversesdtm

title: ds — ds
text: data frame 850 rows 14 variables: STUDYID Study Identifier DOMAIN Domain Abbreviation USUBJID Unique Subject Identifier DSSEQ Sequence Number DSSPID Sponsor-Defined Identifier DSTERM Reported Term Disposition Event DSDECOD Standardized Disposition Term DSCAT Category Disposition Event VISITNUM Visit Number VISIT Visit Name DSDTC Date/Time Collection DSSTDTC Start Date/Time Disposition Event DSSTDY Study Day Start Disposition Event DSSCAT Subcategory Disposition Event

title: ds — ds
text: data pharmaversesdtm.

title: mh — mh
text: mh modified pharmaversesdtm

title: mh — mh
text: data frame 1818 rows 29 variables: STUDYID Study Identifier DOMAIN Domain Abbreviation USUBJID Unique Subject Identifier MHSEQ Sequence Number MHSPID Sponsor-Defined Identifier MHTERM Reported Term Medical History MHLLT Lowest Level Term MHDECOD Dictionary-Derived Term MHHLT High Level Term MHHLGT High Level Group Term MHCAT Category Medical History MHBODSYS Body System Organ Class MHSEV Severity/Intensity VISITNUM Visit Number VISIT Visit Name VISITDY Planned Study Day Visit MHDTC Date/Time History Collection MHSTDTC Start Date/Time Medical History Event MHDY Study Day History Collection MHENDTC End Date/Time Medical History Event MHPRESP Medical History Event Pre-Specified MHOCCUR Medical History Occurrence MHSTRTPT Start Relative Reference Time Point MHENRTPT End Relative Reference Time Point MHSTTPT Start Reference Time Point MHENTPT End Reference Time Point MHENRF End Relative Reference Period MHSTAT Completion Status MHTOXGR Standard Toxicity Grade

title: mh — mh
text: data pharmaversesdtm.

what: pharmaversesdtmjnj: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data — pharmaversesdtmjnj-package
title: pharmaversesdtmjnj: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data — pharmaversesdtmjnj-package
text: set Study Data Tabulation Model (SDTM) datasets constructed modifying 'pharmaversesdtm' package meet J&J Innovative Medicine's standard data structure Clinical Statistical Programming.

title: pharmaversesdtmjnj: J&J Innovative Medicine SDTM Test Data — pharmaversesdtmjnj-package
text: Maintainer: David Munoz Tord david.munoztord@mailbox.org Authors: Nicholas Masel nmasel@.jnj.com Joe Kovach jkovach2@.jnj.com contributors: J&J Innovative Medicine [copyright holder, funder]

title: pharmaversesdtmjnj 0.0.1
text: CRAN release: 2025-07-07

title: pharmaversesdtmjnj 0.0.1
text: MH (Medical History) DS (Disposition) Built top ‘pharmaversesdtm’ package Implemented data conversion pharmaverse format J&J standards format Provided reproducible consistent test data
